name: Paper Zelda
description: press f1 in game to see a list of controls. I made this game back in 2011. Its full of spaghetti code and looks like garbage, but I'm still kind proud of it, haha. I had a lot of fun making it. I learned a lot while making it, And I still go back and play it from time to time. The old game maker site that it was uploaded to was taken down some time ago. A few people have requested that I put it up so they can play it, so hear it is. I fixed some of the bugs, but there are still plenty more in there, haha. I also added the source code for you to mess with if you like. You'll need a copy of Game Maker 8 or Game Maker Studio 1 to open the gmk files though. I don't think I'll ever finish this game, but it does have an end... kind of.  if you collect all three peaces of the triforce then go back to the old man, he will congratulate you for finding them.
